title: Ineligible for Loot
body: Queued up for a game and windows decided to update causing my ping to be at a constant 140-200 ms while spiking up to 2k at some points, decided it would better to dc and let the update download faster and when it finished I reconnected and am now ineligible for loot from leaving/afk/dcing, is there anything I can do to rectify this as it was out of my control?

replies.body: That *really* sucks that your pc updates caused you to leave. You shouldn't have gotten punished though unless the system was starting to notice a trend in your recent. leaves. After playing enough honorable games without being marked as AFK that loot will unlock again.
